backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: Lists features, associated files, components, and test IDs for proposal-flow, audio, and performance requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides high‑level descriptions of frontend/index.html and App.tsx behavior for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base variables and theme overrides defining color tokens, dark mode values, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Main standalone Valentine proposal page with animations, evasive No button logic, audio, and interactive flow.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React component that immediately redirects to index.html while displaying a themed loading screen.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using react‑query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for Internet Identity login, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle management.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point wiring React, InternetIdentityProvider, QueryClient, and global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, and layout utilities, with dark mode and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current state, requirements, issues, and architectural notes for a single‑file animated Valentine proposal site. Defines existing features and flags the file as a request for fixes and improvements.
